item.title: Mizuame v0.1.0
item.description: New Release We released Mizuame v0.1.0! The note on menu bar. Auto save. Some note theme. Change note size. Change font size. And more.

item.title: Features
item.description: A sticky note The notes that you type will be saved on your PC. Therefore, you cannot share the notes on your the other PC. Because this app is not a high performance sticky note app. Auto-save every time you type. Themes You can choose a theme. For example, “White and Blue”, “White and Pink” and more. White and Blue White and Pink Light/Dark mode Light Mode Dark Mode Others You can change the font size and size of stiky note from “Settings”.
